thread.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Real Madrid star avoids booking after throwing ball at Sevilla winger Vitolo before scoring with spot-kick
thread.title_full: Cristiano Ronaldo: Real Madrid star avoids booking after throwing ball at Sevilla winger Vitolo before scoring with spot-kick

author: sunsportonline
title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Real Madrid star avoids booking after throwing ball at Sevilla winger Vitolo before scoring with spot-kick
text:
EFL Spot of bother Cristiano Ronaldo: Real Madrid star avoids booking after throwing ball at Sevilla winger Vitolo before scoring with spot-kick 
Ronaldo scored the penalty to give Real Madrid the lead but the referee controversially decided not to book the Ballon d'Or winner By Dan Pellegrini Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments CRISTIANO RONALDO caused mayhem when he threw the ball at Sevilla’s Vitolo after the winger scuffed the penalty spot before Ronaldo was due to step up. 
Ronaldo reacted angrily by throwing the ball at the player which sparked a scuffle amongst both sets of players before order was restored – somehow, the Ballon d’Or winner avoided a card. I liked a @YouTube video https://t.co/ZpNW6hRsUz Cristiano Ronaldo throws the ball at Vitolo in Sevilla vs Real Madrid La Liga Ronaldo throws the ball at Vitolo AP:Associated Press Ronaldo celebrates scoring the penalty 
Ronaldo added salt to the wounds of the Sevilla players by scoring the resulting spot kick. Related articles GAZZA'S STRUGGLE Who is Paul Gascoigne?
